title: Ephraimâ€™s Inheritance
summary: Joshua 16 describes the territory assigned to the tribe of Ephraim, one of the sons of Joseph. Though they receive fertile land, the Ephraimites do not fully drive out the Canaanites living among them.

faq.question: Which tribe is given land in this chapter?
What issue is mentioned about their inheritance?
faq.answer: They failed to remove the Canaanites completely and allowed them to live in the land.
